item.text: This is an oracle, the Lord’s message concerning Israel: The Lord—he who stretches out the heavens and lays the foundations of the earth, who forms the human spirit within a person—says,

“<st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="02009" class="">about to</st> <st data-num="07760" class="">make</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="05592" class="">cup</st> that brings <st data-num="07478" class="">dizziness</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">nations</st>; indeed, <st data-num="05921 03063">Judah</st> will <st data-num="01571" class="">also</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">be included</st> when <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="04692 05921">is besieged</st>.

<st data-num="01961" class="">Moreover</st>, on <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> I will <st data-num="07760" class="">make</st> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> a <st data-num="04614" class="">heavy</st> <st data-num="068" class="">burden</st><n id="1" /> for <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">nations</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> who try to <st data-num="06006" class="">carry</st> it will be <st data-num="08295" class="">seriously</st> <st data-num="08295" class="">injured</st>;<n id="2" /> yet <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01471" class="">peoples</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> will be <st data-num="0622" class="">assembled</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> it.

On that day,” says the Lord, “I will strike every horse with confusion and its rider with madness. I will pay close attention to the house of Judah, but will strike all the horses of the nations with blindness.
Then the leaders of Judah will say to themselves, ‘The inhabitants of Jerusalem are a means of strength to us through their God, the Lord of Heaven’s Armies.’

On <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st><n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="07760" class="">make</st> the <st data-num="0441" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> like an <st data-num="03595 0784">igniter</st><n id="2" /> among <st data-num="06086" class="">sticks</st> and a <st data-num="0784" class="">burning</st> <st data-num="03940" class="">torch</st> among <st data-num="05995" class="">sheaves</st>, and they will <st data-num="0398" class="">burn up</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05439" class="">surrounding</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">nations</st> <st data-num="05921 03225">right</st> and <st data-num="05921 08040">left</st>. Then the people of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> will <st data-num="03427" class="">settle</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">once more</st> in their <st data-num="08478" class="">place</st>, the city of <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>.
The Lord also will deliver the homes of Judah first, so that the splendor of the kingship of David and of the people of Jerusalem may not exceed that of Judah.

On that day the Lord himself will defend the inhabitants of Jerusalem, so that the weakest among them will be like mighty David, and the dynasty of David will be like God, like the angel of the Lord before them.
So on that day I will set out to destroy all the nations that come against Jerusalem.

“I will pour out on the kingship of David and the population of Jerusalem a spirit of grace and supplication so that they will look to me, the one they have pierced. They will lament for him as one laments for an only son, and there will be a bitter cry for him like the bitter cry for a firstborn.

On <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> the <st data-num="04553" class="">lamentation</st> in <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> will <st data-num="01431" class="">be</st> as <st data-num="01431" class="">great</st> as the <st data-num="04553" class="">lamentation</st> at <st data-num="01910" class="">Hadad Rimmon</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="01237" class="">plain</st> of <st data-num="04023" class="">Megiddo</st>.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> will <st data-num="05594" class="">mourn</st>, <st data-num="04940" class="">each</st> <st data-num="04940" class="">clan</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">by itself</st>—the <st data-num="04940" class="">clan</st> of the royal <st data-num="01004" class="">household</st> of <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">by itself</st> and their <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">by themselves</st>; the <st data-num="04940" class="">clan</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">family</st> of <st data-num="05416" class="">Nathan</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0905" class="">by itself</st> and their <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">by themselves</st>;

the <st data-num="04940" class="">clan</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="03878" class="">Levi</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">by itself</st> and their <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">by themselves</st>; and the <st data-num="04940" class="">clan</st> of the <st data-num="08097" class="">Shimeites</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0905" class="">by itself</st> and their <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">by themselves</st>;
all the clans that remain, each separately with their wives.
